client_description.Summary Note:
The RM first met Brunner Baumgartner Kägi at a wine tasting event in Zürich. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Brunner Baumgartner Kägi is a 66 year old and comes from Switzerland.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
client_description.Family Background: Brunner Baumgartner Kägi is married to Lea. They are proud parents of 1 child: Elisabeth.
client_description.Education Background:
Brunner received his secondary school diploma from Lycée cantonal de Porrentruy Jura in 1977.
Brunner completed his university studies at Lausanne Hospitality School in 1983.
client_description.Occupation History:
Brunner Baumgartner Kägi is a 66 year old retired Conglomerate Owner from Switzerland. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
In 1983, Brunner Baumgartner Kägi started working as a Plant Manager at Schindler Holding Ltd., marking the beginning of his successful career.
He then transitioned to Schindler Holding Ltd. as a Operations Director, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1989 to 1990.
He spent 1 years working as a CEO at Georg Fischer Ltd., refining his expertise and building a strong network.
His next role was as a Chairman at Georg Fischer Ltd., where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 1992 to 1994.
He held the position of Conglomerate Owner at Siemens AG (Swiss branch) from 1994 until his retirement.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 3610000 CHF, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has flat located in Chur, worth 2300000 CHF.

He does not have any inheritances.
client_description.Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
